name: **Inishdegil Beg / Carrignaglamph**
description: Inishdegil Beg / Carrignaglamph L740-674 Sheet 37 Two small grassy islands just NE of Inishdegil More, joined at all but the highest waters. Landing place on sheltered gravel beach on SE facing side of Carrignaglamph. Sheep, Purple Sandpiper, Arctic Tern. Carrignaglamph has the ruin of a bothan as well as lazybeds, and views.
